name: TopRight
description:
TopRight is a strategic marketing and consulting services firm founded in 2006 by consultants from top firms (McKinsey, Booz & Company, CSC Index), former Chief Marketing Officers and senior practitioners in sales, marketing and applied technologies.
Services: 
Marketing & Branding Strategy
Enterprise Marketing Management
Marketing Transformation
Analytics, Modeling & Insight
Marketing Spend Effectiveness
Consumer Experience
Change Managment
Marketing Automation
Align Strategy, Operations & IT
Social Media
Direct Marketing
Creative Services
Sports Sponsorship
Public Relations
We Help Our Clients by…providing expert insight to create value by leveraging extensive industry and marketing / sales expertise, bringing a mix of creativity & rigorous, fact-based problem solving to develop pragmatic and implementable strategies
 
We Provide Our Clients with…a marriage of strategy and execution to drive business results and a new philosophy of marketing with an expanded view across the enterprise to include all forms of interactions with customers
 
We Unlock the Potential of Our Client’s Businesses by…building the capabilities to drive profitable growth by increasing effectiveness to grow the top line while increasing efficiencies to reduce costs, facilitating transformation to optimize process, organization, culture, measurement, and technology and leveraging applied technologies to integrate and enable critical business functions, cross-enterprise data, optimized sales and marketing processes, and customer experiences
